mapper.insert: insert into reply (qnId, reId, content, username, reRegDate) values (#{qnId}, re_seq.nextval, #{content}, #{username}, sysdate)
mapper.select: select * from reply where reId = #{reId} order by reId asc
mapper.update: update reply set content = #{content}, reUpdateDate = sysdate where reId = #{reId}
